title: Real Madrid Quiz
description: Test your knowledge about the history, legends, and records of Real Madrid CF!

questions.question: In which year was Real Madrid founded?
questions.explanation: Real Madrid was founded on March 6, 1902.

questions.question: What is Real Madrid's home stadium?
questions.explanation: The Santiago Bernabéu Stadium is Real Madrid’s home ground since 1947.

questions.question: Who is Real Madrid’s all-time top goal scorer?
questions.explanation: Cristiano Ronaldo scored 450 goals for Real Madrid between 2009–2018.

questions.question: What is Real Madrid’s traditional kit color?
questions.explanation: They are nicknamed 'Los Blancos' due to their all-white kit.

questions.question: How many UEFA Champions League titles has Real Madrid won as of 2025?
questions.explanation: Real Madrid claimed their 15th Champions League in 2024.

questions.question: Who was Real Madrid’s first Ballon d’Or winner?
questions.explanation: Alfredo Di Stéfano won the Ballon d’Or in 1957.

questions.question: Which Spanish club is Real Madrid’s biggest rival?
questions.explanation: The rivalry between Real Madrid and FC Barcelona is known as El Clásico.

questions.question: Who was Real Madrid’s president who started the ‘Galácticos’ era?
questions.explanation: Florentino Pérez launched the Galácticos project in 2000.

questions.question: Which player won the Ballon d’Or in 2018 while playing for Real Madrid?
questions.explanation: Luka Modrić won the Ballon d’Or after leading Croatia to the World Cup final.

questions.question: What is the nickname of Real Madrid supporters?
questions.explanation: Fans are called 'Los Merengues', referencing the white color like the dessert.

questions.question: Who was the coach when Real Madrid won 'La Décima' (10th UCL title)?
questions.explanation: Carlo Ancelotti guided Madrid to 'La Décima' in 2014.

questions.question: Who scored the dramatic equalizer in the 2014 Champions League final?
questions.explanation: Sergio Ramos equalized in stoppage time vs Atlético Madrid.

questions.question: Which player was NOT part of the early-2000s Galácticos era?
questions.explanation: Benzema joined in 2009, after the original Galácticos period.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid legend captained Spain at the 2010 World Cup?
questions.explanation: Goalkeeper Iker Casillas was Spain’s captain in 2010.

questions.question: In which year did Zinedine Zidane first become Real Madrid’s head coach?
questions.explanation: Zidane took charge in January 2016 and won three straight UCLs.

questions.question: Who scored the winning goal in the 2022 Champions League Final vs Liverpool?
questions.explanation: Vinícius Júnior scored the decisive goal for Madrid in 2022.

questions.question: Which player inherited the number 7 shirt after Cristiano Ronaldo left?
questions.explanation: Eden Hazard took over the number 7 after Ronaldo’s departure.

questions.question: Who is Real Madrid’s current head coach as of 2025?
questions.explanation: Carlo Ancelotti remains the coach through 2025.

questions.question: Which club did Real Madrid defeat in the 2024 Champions League final?
questions.explanation: Real Madrid defeated Borussia Dortmund 2-0 in 2024.

questions.question: Which midfielder became Real Madrid’s top scorer in the 2023/24 season?
questions.explanation: Jude Bellingham scored the most goals for Madrid in 2023/24.
